title: Bulk Lot Of Accessory Piping And Wall Brackets (No Equipment Included)
item_description:
Bulk Lot Of Accessory Piping And Wall Brackets (No Equipment Included)

The piping included in this lot is outlined in red. Nothing else shown in the photos is included in this lot besides the piping and brackets that are outlined in red.

Disassembly Note: All piping and brackets will be removed by a rigging company hired by West Auctions. All piping will be cut into 10'-30' sections. Buyer will have no rights to choose how pipe, where it is cut, how long the sections are, or how it is removed from the building. More than likely, many of the pipes will be damaged during this removal process.

Loading Note: Rigging and loading assistance will be provided by a licensed professional rigging company contracted by West Auctions. Loading assistance does not include additional crating, palletizing, packaging, or securing, etc.

Removal Note: This item is available for removal by appointment only from July 21, 2025 through July 25, 2025. Please contact West Auctions to schedule your appointment.
